name: UpdateApplicationStatus
description:
Updates the status or details of an application.

Use this tool to update an application's status or details. Ensure you have the `candidatesWrite` permission. For custom field updates, use the `customFields.setValue` endpoint.

parameters.name: application_update_payload
parameters.description: JSON object containing applicationId, sourceId, creditedToUserId, createdAt, and sendNotifications to update application details. sendNotifications controls subscriber notifications.

sendNotifications.description: Whether or not users who are subscribed to the application should be notified that application was updated. Default is true.
